SELECT nvl(max(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TESTRESULT
INSERT INTO TESTRESULT (TESTRESULTNUM, TESTSCORE, TESTNUM, CLASSAPPLYNUM) VALUES (#{testresultNum}, #{testScore}, #{testNum}, #{classapplyNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE TESTRESULT SET TESTSCORE=#{testScore}, TESTNUM=#{testNum}, CLASSAPPLYNUM=#{classapplyNum}, STUDENTNUM=#{studentNum}, CLASSNUM=#{classNum} WHERE TESTRESULTNUM=#{testresultNum}
mapper.select: SELECT C.CLASSNUM, C.CLASSAPPLYNUM, C.STUDENTNUM, C.SCORE, TR.TESTRESULTNUM, TR.TESTSCORE, TR.TESTNUM, S.STUDENTNAME, GRADE_TOTAL(C.SCORE) AS GRADE, SCORE_TOTAL(C.SCORE) AS SCORET FROM CLASSAPPLY C JOIN STUDENT S ON (S.STUDENTNUM = C.STUDENTNUM) LEFT OUTER JOIN TESTRESULT TR ON (C.CLASSAPPLYNUM = TR.CLASSAPPLYNUM) WHERE C.CLASSNUM = #{classNum} ORDER BY CLASSAPPLYNUM

SELECT C.CLASSNUM, C.CLASSAPPLYNUM, C.STUDENTNUM, C.SCORE, CL.CREDIT, CL.CLASSNAME, TR.TESTRESULTNUM, TR.TESTSCORE, TR.TESTNUM, S.STUDENTNAME, P.PROFESSORNAME, GRADE_TOTAL(C.SCORE) AS GRADE, SCORE_TOTAL(C.SCORE) AS SCORET FROM CLASSAPPLY C JOIN TESTRESULT TR ON (C.CLASSAPPLYNUM = TR.CLASSAPPLYNUM) JOIN STUDENT S ON (S.STUDENTNUM = C.STUDENTNUM) JOIN CLASS CL ON (C.CLASSNUM = CL.CLASSNUM) JOIN PROFESSOR P ON (P.PROFESSORNUM = CL.PROFESSORNUM) WHERE S.STUDNETNUM = #{studentNum} AND CL.CLASSNAME = #{className} AND CL.CREDIT = #{creadit} AND C.SCORE = #{score} AND C.CLASSAPPLNUM = #{classapplyNum} ORDER BY CLASSAPPLYNUM
